item.title: Predicting cloud movements
item.description: In this notebook we will attempt to predict or forecast the movement of rain/clouds over the area of North America! Of course the weather is a known chaotic system, therefore we will try to create an initial benchmark by throwing a deep learning model at the problem. The images can be downloaded from AWS S3 using the following link https://s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/data-problems/precipitation_data.zip Import some libraries import os from os import listdir from PIL import Image as PImage import matplotlib.
